mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO user_picture (user_id, picture_url, sort, type, created_user, updated_user, created_time, updated_time, delete_status) VALUES
(#{item.userId}, #{item.pictureUrl}, #{item.sort}, #{item.type}, #{item.createdUser}, #{item.updatedUser}, #{item.createdTime}, #{item.updatedTime}, #{item.deleteStatus})
